name: Terrago ( Demo )
description:
this is a demo, its a platformer game, theres 1 small level to try out, in the future it will have alot of levels, there will be more enemies, more powerups and more, i have spent a couple days on this, and i love it, i would greatly appreciate if you can comment and tell me what you liked and did not like or any suggestions, hope you enjoy!

update 0.2: i added spikes and a bee, coins to collect, made the character collision better, added more control options and other small changes :)
